headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://www.googletagmanager.com https://www.google-analytics.com https://challenges.cloudflare.com; connect-src 'self' https://www.googletagmanager.com https://www.google-analytics.com https://challenges.cloudflare.com; img-src 'self' data: https://www.svtech.cl; font-src 'self' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://fonts.gstatic.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; frame-src 'self' https://challenges.cloudflare.com; object-src 'none';
